Directions: Set aside the cheese sauce packet. In a saucepan, cook macaroni according to package directions; drain and set aside. In the same pan, saute onion and green pepper in butter. Return macaroni to the pan. Add milk and contents of cheese sauce packet; stir until smooth. Stir in the soup, tuna, mushrooms and pimientos.
Pour into a greased 2-qt. baking dish. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until bubbly.
Ingredients: 1 (7.25 ounce) package macaroni and cheese mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup, undiluted
